entry.title: Pack of 10 - 10 Sq.Ft Gold Peel and Stick Backsplash Rhinestone Studded 3D Metal Wall Tiles
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3400
Type: Decorations
Price: 39.99 - 113.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Material: Brushed Metal and Colored Rhinestones
1 Qty: 10 Panels
Each Panel Size: 12" x 12"
Total Area Covered: 10 SqFt
Depth: 1/8"
Design: 16 Square Pattern With Triangles and Rhinestones
Each Square: 4 Triangles + 1 Rhinestones
Rhinestones: 16 / Tile
Total Rhinestones: 160
Features: Scratch, Splash, and Heat resistant
Easy to install (Peel and Stick)
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Create a high end, designer look without spending fortunes with our sparkling range of self-adhesive aluminum tiles that are affordable, durable, and undeniably adorable! Made of high quality brushed metal with scratch, splash, and heat resistant qualities, these glimmering tiles are suitable for kitchen backsplash, bathroom backsplash, accent walls, and decorative purposes. Robust metal, won't stain, crack or chip. With an easy peel and stick backing, our Metal Wall Tiles will transform any dull space into a dazzling display with little work and time. These lightweight tile stickers are easy to cut and need no spacers or grout and can easily bend to create perfect corners with minimum cutting and zero wasted offcuts. Embellished with shimmering rhinestones, these glitz tiles will add a touch of elite elegance to your bathrooms, bedrooms, kitchen, fireplace, living room, and even shelves and cabinets.

Additional Information:
  • 1 Qty : 10 Panels
  • Each Panel Size : 12" x 12"
  • Total Area Covered: 10 SqFt
  • Depth: 1/8" 
  • Design of each Tile: 16 Square Pattern with Triangle and Rhinestones
  • Each Square: 4 Triangles & 1 Rhinestone
  • Total Triangle: 64 
  • Total Rhinestones: 16 / Tile
  • Triangle: 2.75" x 2.25" x 1 5/8"
  • Square Diamond: 5/8" x 5/8"
  • Item can be trimmed to the desired length based on the pattern for the area of application.
  • Recommended Use: DIY, Featured Walls, Living & Bed Rooms, Bathroom, Kitchen, etc

PLEASE NOTE: Some wall tiles will be inconsistent when trimmed due to the size of patterns.

Small square mirror tiles are seamlessly attached in each panel to give you an attractive alternative to more traditional material for use in kitchen or bathroom backsplash, feature walls or hallway. Mirror tiles work great as both a border or in a full-size sheet creating a sense of greater space through its reflective nature. With scratch, splash, and heat resistant qualities, these bold and beautiful tiles are affordable, durable, and a sensible choice to upgrade your home or office space!

entry.title: 10 Pack | 40 Sq Ft 3D White Foam Self Adhesive Wall Panels - Waves Design
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3400
Type: Decorations
Price: 59.99 - 161.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 10 Panels
Material: Foam
Color: White
Style: Waves Style
1 Quantity Covers 40 Sq Ft of Wall
Each Panel Size: 24"L x 24"W
Each Panel Thickness: 2mm
Self-Adhesive Backing: Peel and stick to apply
Features: Non-Toxic, Odor Free, Waterproof and Moisture-proof
Recommended Use: DIY, Featured Walls, Living & Bed Rooms, Banquet Halls etc
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.
All sizes are approximate measurements

[Information]

 

Innovative 3D wall panels

Modern and innovative, these 3D wall panels provide an ideal wall covering solution for interior decoration. Perfect to add aesthetic beauty into modern homes, these Wave Design Wall Panels are also a perfect solution to unsightly or problematic wall, ceiling or any surface that needs covering.

Wave Style Textured

Featuring 3D Wave Style textured surface and soft foam construction, these easy to peel and stick wall panels are an affordable, adorable, and durable way to decorate and renovate your boring and dreary walls. Perfect to stylishly spruce up your living room walls, bedroom walls, kitchen walls, TV background, feature walls and ceiling in house decoration; company logo wall, lobby backdrop, reception desk front in office, restaurant, cafes or night clubs decoration.
 

Versatile and Multipurpose

Versatile and multipurpose, these 3D panels will transform your drab walls and backdrops into spectacular sights. Other than creating an amazing visual effect for walls and backdrops, this adhesive 3D wall paper can also be fashioned into fancy furniture designs, such as cabinet doors, bed headboard, bedroom wardrobe and kitchen cabinet. Offering multitude of décor applications, these panels can be installed indoor, outdoor, ceiling or any other surface. You can use them in drawing room, bed room, kids room, lobby, office, Photo-shoot backdrop, meeting rooms, offices, banquet halls, restaurants, cafes, cinemas, night clubs and more!

 

Additional Information:

  • Easy Peeling Of Back Paper : Blow the back with hair dryer on high heat and try to peel after 1-2 mins of hot air blowing.
  • Make sure the wall is dry before applying the Wall Foam.

[Information]

Add lush luxury to each and every corner of your home or workspace with our stunning range of Modish Mirror Mosaic Wall Sticker Panels. Each gorgeous sheet contains specially selected pieces of beveled glass reflective mirrors, modish marble glass tiles and fanciful foil mosaics. Together, these glitzy gems impart an absolutely glamorous look and texture to your plain bathroom walls, kitchen walls, lobby, fireplace, and featured walls. These sleek shiny mosaic tiles work great as both a border or in a full-size sheet creating a sense of greater space through its reflective nature. Add this stylish contemporary look to your bathroom or kitchen and transform your home into an imperial realm. The fashionable and visually attractive Metal Mirror Mosaic Series tiles provide an attractive alternative to more traditional materials for use in kitchen or bathroom backsplash, hallway, feature walls or decorative borders in combination with plain or decorative porcelain tiles.

entry.title: Pack of 10 | 58 Sq.Ft White Peel and Stick 3D Foam Brick Wall Tile
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3400
Type: Decorations
Price: 59.99 - 161.97 (2 variants)

[About]

Color: White
Material: Foam
1 Quantity : 10 panels
1 Quantity Covers 58 sq.ft. of Wall
Panel Length: 2.5ft. (30 inches)
Panel Width : 2.3ft. (27.5 inches)
Thickness of each Panel: 2mm
Features: Waterproof & Anti Collision
Peel and stick to apply, pull up to remove
Easy Peeling Of Back Paper: Blow the back with hair dryer on high heat and try to peel after 1-2 mins of hot air blowing
Recommended Use: DIY, Featured Walls, Living & Bed Rooms, Banquet Halls etc.
All sizes are approximate measurements.
Due to different light settings, the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Give your walls and backdrops a stunning visual impact with our new Self- Adhesive 3D Brick Wall Sticker Panels. These DIY peel and stick brick 3D wall decals are made of a self-adhesive substrate topped with an eco-friendly highly flocking embossed texture. The stickers are light weight, water resistant, stain resistant, and are easy to install. Their touchable textured brick-like surface offers customers amazing strong visual effect. The attributes of “self-adhesive” and “pre-pasted” makes the installation process quick, easy, and mess-free. Simply remove the adhesive backing, cut it in your desired shape and size with a pair of scissors, and apply it on any clean and sleek surface! And whoosh! Your designer wall is all ready to flaunt your style statement!

Besides being highly modern and stylish, our 3D soft foam brick wall stickers help in noise and temperature control as well as save your money on the professional application labor cost! These beauties make an ideal wall treatment for your featured walls, TV walls, sofa background, living room walls, bedroom walls, office walls, mirrors, closets, glasses, and any other smooth and clean surface!

Additional Information:

  • Color: White
  • Material: Foam
  • 1 Quantity:10 panels
  • 1 Quantity Covers 58 Sq.Ft of Wall
  • Panel Length: 2.5 Ft (30 inches)
  • Panel Width: 2.3 Ft (27.6 inches)
  • Thickness: 0.25cm
  • Features: Waterproof & Anti Collision
  • Peel and stick to apply, pull up to remove
  • Easy Peeling Of Back Paper: Blow the back with hair dryer on high heat and try to peel after 1-2 mins of hot air blowing
  • Recommended Use: DIY, Featured Walls, Living & Bed Rooms, Banquet Halls etc

Features:                                                     How to use:

 Note: Panels comes folded in half. Can have a faint plastic smell, air the panels out to dissipate the smell.

Simply remove the adhesive backing, cut it in your desired shape and size with a pair of scissors, and apply it on any clean and sleek surface! And whoosh! Your designer wall is all ready to flaunt your style statement!

Besides being highly modern and stylish, our 3D soft foam brick wall stickers help in noise and temperature control as well as save your money on the professional application labor cost! These beauties make an ideal wall treatment for your featured walls, TV walls, sofa background, living room walls, bedroom walls, office walls, mirrors, closets, glasses, and any other smooth and clean surface!

Additional Information:

  • Color: Black
  • Material: Foam
  • 1 Quantity : 10 panels
  • 1 Quantity Covers 58 Sq.Ft of Wall
  • Panel Length: 2.5 Ft (30 inches)
  • Panel Width : 2.3 Ft (27.5 inches)
  • Thickness: 0.25cm
  • Features : Waterproof & Anti Collision
  • Peel and stick to apply, pull up to remove
  • Easy Peeling Of Back Paper : Blow the back with hair dryer on high heat and try to peel after 1-2 mins of hot air blowing
  • Recommended Use : DIY, Featured Walls, Living & Bed Rooms, Banquet Halls etc

Features:                                                     How to use:

 Note: Panels comes folded in half. Can have a faint plastic smell, air the panels out to dissipate the smell.
